name: Dodge, Drive & Dodge
description:
Please leave feedback of the game in the comments below, be as honest as possible. I want to improve and your feedback will be greatly appreciated! Thank you for your time!

Dodge, Drive & Dodge is a arcade style game where the player has to dodge past obstacles and gain points.

This was a week long prototype that I developed to further my understanding using Unity and C#. I plan on further development of this project in the future (hopefully releasing a more professional looking game).
